resources.string: FFmpeg4Android Demo shows how easy it is for every application to run FFMpeg commands.
你可以点击取消按钮终止渲染任务

Progress bar with notification example (and stop / cancel support).\n The notification will work only on Android 4 or above.\n To support notifications on older versions, use the Android support library
此命令会旋转 /sdcard/videokit/in.mp4 90度, 输出文件到目录： /sdcard/videokit/out.mp4:
